description: Fretello teaches you the guitar skills you need to play the songs you love, helping you learn guitar with interactive tutorials. Youll master all the basic skills with our guitar lessons for beginners, develop them with our daily workouts, then put everything into practice by learning to play your favorite songs.  LEARN Well teach you everything from how to sit and hold your guitar to mastering notes, rhythm and melodies in our fun and simple guitar lessons. Plus, youll get detailed feedback on your progress from our artificial intelligence listening technology.  PRACTICE Well help you practice and develop while you learn to play guitar, just like a real-life guitar teacher. Well structure your daily workouts and create guitar lessons to improve your skills and techniques while customizing your exercises and sessions so theyre specific to you.  PLAY And heres the fun bit about learning to play guitar with Fretello. Once youve mastered the basics, well put everything into practice by teaching you to play your favorite songs using simple step-by-step instructions. Youll be rocking in front of your friends (or even a live audience!) before you know it.   Permissions To make sure you can access all of Fretellos features and get the best possible guitar-learning experience, we need permission to access the following functions:  RECORD_AUDIO Fretello needs access to your microphone to give feedback on your playing.  WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE Fretello needs access to your phones storage to download song sheets for you to practice offline.   LETS STAY IN TOUCH Facebook: https://facebook.com/fretellomusic/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/fretello_music/  Instagram: https://instagram.com/fretello_music/  You can read our privacy policy at https://fretello.com/privacy-policy/ You can read our terms of service at https://fretello.com/terms/
